duck: Future Vision Technologies - Future Vision Technologies (FVT), operating from 1991 to 1995, was part of the second wave of companies working to commercialize virtual reality technology.
Flash vacuum thermolysis - Pyrolysis is a thermochemical decomposition of organic material at elevated temperatures in the absence of oxygen.

Final value theorem - In mathematical analysis, the final value theorem (FVT) is one of several similar theorems used to relate frequency domain expressions to the time domain behavior as time approaches infinity.
